db:abstract.db:para: A base class to be used to provide textures.

db:listitem.db:para: Qt3DRender::QSharedGLTexture, Qt3DRender::QTexture1D, Qt3DRender::QTexture1DArray, Qt3DRender::QTexture2D, Qt3DRender::QTexture2DArray, Qt3DRender::QTexture2DMultisample, Qt3DRender::QTexture2DMultisampleArray, Qt3DRender::QTexture3D, Qt3DRender::QTextureBuffer, Qt3DRender::QTextureCubeMap, Qt3DRender::QTextureCubeMapArray, Qt3DRender::QTextureLoader, and Qt3DRender::QTextureRectangle

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QAbstractTexture class shouldn't be used directly but rather through one of its subclasses. Each subclass implements a given texture target (2D, 2DArray, 3D, CubeMap ...) Each subclass provides a set of functors for each layer, cube map face and mipmap level. In turn the backend uses those functor to properly fill a corresponding OpenGL texture with data. It is expected the functor does as minimal processing as possible so as not to slow down textures generation and upload. If the content of a texture is the result of a slow procedural generation process, it is recommended not to implement this directly in a functor.
All textures are unique. If you instantiate twice the same texture this will create 2 identical textures on the GPU, no sharing will take place.

db:section.db:title: enum QAbstractTexture::CubeMapFace
db:section.db:para: This enum identifies the faces of a cube map texture

db:td.db:para: Specify the positive X face of a cube map
Specify the negative X face of a cube map
Specify the positive Y face of a cube map
Specify the negative Y face of a cube map
Specify the positive Z face of a cube map
Specify the negative Z face of a cube map
Specify all the faces of a cube map

db:note.db:para: AllFaces should only be used when a behavior needs to be applied to all the faces of a cubemap. This is the case for example when using a cube map as a texture attachment. Using AllFaces in the attachment specfication would result in all faces being bound to the attachment point. On the other hand, if a specific face is specified, the attachment would only be using the specified face.

db:section.db:title: enum QAbstractTexture::Filter
db:section.db:para: Holds the filter type of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: enum QAbstractTexture::Status
db:section.db:para: Contains the status of the texture provider.

db:td.db:para: Target will be determined by the Qt3D engine

db:section.db:title: enum QAbstractTexture::TextureFormat
db:section.db:para: This list describes all possible texture formats

db:section.db:title: comparisonFunction : ComparisonFunction
db:section.db:para: Holds the comparison function of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: comparisonMode : ComparisonMode
db:section.db:para: Holds the comparison mode of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: depth : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the depth of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: format : TextureFormat
db:section.db:para: Holds the format of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: generateMipMaps : bool
db:section.db:para: Holds whether the texture provider should auto generate mipmaps.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] handle : const QVariant
db:section.db:para: Holds the current texture handle, if Qt 3D is using the OpenGL renderer, handle is a texture id integer.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] handleType : const HandleType
db:section.db:para: Holds the current texture handle type.

db:section.db:title: height : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the height of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: layers : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the maximum layer count of the texture provider. By default, the maximum layer count is 1.

db:note.db:para: this has a meaning only for texture providers that have 3D or array target formats.

db:section.db:title: magnificationFilter : Filter
db:section.db:para: Holds the magnification filter of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: maximumAnisotropy : float
db:section.db:para: Holds the maximum anisotropy of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: minificationFilter : Filter
db:section.db:para: Holds the minification filter of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: mipLevels : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the mipmap levels of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: samples : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the number of samples per texel for the texture provider. By default, the number of samples is 1.

db:note.db:para: this has a meaning only for texture providers that have multisample formats.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] status : const Status
db:section.db:para: Holds the current status of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] target : const Target
db:section.db:para: Holds the target format of the texture provider.

db:note.db:para: The target format can only be set once.

db:section.db:title: width : int
db:section.db:para: Holds the width of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] wrapMode : Qt3DRender::QTextureWrapMode* const
db:section.db:para: Holds the wrap mode of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QAbstractTexture::QAbstractTexture(Qt3DCore::QNode *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: The constructor creates a new QAbstractTexture::QAbstractTexture instance with the specified parent.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QAbstractTexture::QAbstractTexture(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Target target, Qt3DCore::QNode *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: The constructor creates a new QAbstractTexture::QAbstractTexture instance with the specified target and parent.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::addTextureImage(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTextureImage *textureImage)
db:section.db:para: Adds a new Qt3DCore::QAbstractTextureImage textureImage to the texture provider.

db:note.db:para: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTextureImage should never be shared between multiple Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture instances.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::ComparisonFunction QAbstractTexture::comparisonFunction() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current comparison function.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::ComparisonMode QAbstractTexture::comparisonMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current comparison mode.

db:section.db:title: int QAbstractTexture::depth() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the depth of the texture

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::TextureFormat QAbstractTexture::format() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the texture provider's format.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QAbstractTexture::handle() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current texture handle, if Qt 3D is using the OpenGL renderer, handle is a texture id integer.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::HandleType QAbstractTexture::handleType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current texture handle type.

db:section.db:title: int QAbstractTexture::height() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the height of the texture

db:section.db:title: int QAbstractTexture::layers() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the maximum number of layers for the texture provider.

db:note.db:para: this has a meaning only for texture providers that have 3D or array target formats.

db:section.db:title: float QAbstractTexture::maximumAnisotropy() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current maximum anisotropy

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::removeTextureImage(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTextureImage *textureImage)
db:section.db:para: Removes a Qt3DCore::QAbstractTextureImage textureImage from the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: int QAbstractTexture::samples() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of samples per texel for the texture provider.

db:note.db:para: this has a meaning only for texture providers that have multisample formats.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setComparisonFunction(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::ComparisonFunction function)
db:section.db:para: Set the comparison function to function.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setComparisonMode(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::ComparisonMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Set the comparison mode to mode.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setDepth(int depth)
db:section.db:para: Set the depth of the texture to depth.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setFormat(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::TextureFormat format)
db:section.db:para: Set the texture format to format.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setGenerateMipMaps(bool gen)
db:section.db:para: Boolean parameter gen sets a flag indicating whether the texture provider should generate mipmaps or not.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setHeight(int height)
db:section.db:para: Set the height to height.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setLayers(int layers)
db:section.db:para: Set the maximum layer count to layers.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setMagnificationFilter(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Filter f)
db:section.db:para: Set the magnification filter to f.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setMaximumAnisotropy(float anisotropy)
db:section.db:para: Sets the maximum anisotropy to anisotropy.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setMinificationFilter(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Filter f)
db:section.db:para: Set the minification filter to the specified value f.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setSamples(int samples)
db:section.db:para: Set the number of samples per texel to samples.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setSize(int w, int h = 1, int d = 1)
db:section.db:para: Sets the size of the texture provider to width w, height h and depth d.

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QAbstractTexture::setStatus(Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Status status)
db:section.db:para: Set the status of the texture provider to the specified status.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setWidth(int width)
db:section.db:para: Set the width of the texture provider to width.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::setWrapMode(const Qt3DRender::QTextureWrapMode &wrapMode)
db:section.db:para: Set the wrapmode to the value specified in wrapMode.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Status QAbstractTexture::status() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current status of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: Qt3DRender::QAbstractTexture::Target QAbstractTexture::target() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the target format of the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: QList<Qt3DRender::QAbstractTextureImage *> QAbstractTexture::textureImages() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of pointers to QAbstractTextureImage objects contained in the texture provider.

db:section.db:title: void QAbstractTexture::updateData(const Qt3DRender::QTextureDataUpdate &update)
db:section.db:para: Updates a sub region of the texture, defined by update, without having to change the data generator or rely on adding or removing texture images.

db:section.db:title: int QAbstractTexture::width() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the width of the texture
